channel.description: Recent content in Download on Cláudio Silva's Blog

item.title: Offline Microsoft Documentation? Download it!
item.description: On my last article I shared how we can now Contribute to Microsoft Documentation . Today I bring another quick tip on Microsoft Documentation! Download Microsoft Documentation Did you know that we can download PDF files with Microsoft Documentation? I did not know until my colleague called my attention to it few days ago. Important note: This tip is not (yet?) available for all Microsoft’s product suite. You should confirm if this tip applies to the product you need.
